title: WATCH TEXAS FOOTBALL PLAYERS TARGET REFEREE AFTER ‘BAD CALL’
content:
Two high school football players decided it was a good idea to blindside a ref during the last part of a game because they felt he made a ‘bad call’. What should be the punishment for this? We think they should receive severe punishment to set an example for other players. An investigation is underway 
The post appeared first on 100percentfedUp.com.... Read more
